bug.author: ll490187880
bug.summary: TypeError: annotations() takes 2 positional arguments but 3 were given
bug.description: Hello, after compiling with pip install --editable, I get the error with openpifpaf.predict. If I just pip install openpifpafï¼Œit runs well. <denchmark-code>openpifpaf/openpifpaf/decoder/processor.py", line 24, in <listcomp> return [f(*i) for i in iterable] TypeError: annotations() takes 2 positional arguments but 3 were given </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: When I checkout the v0.9.0 branch, the problem is solved. There may be some bugs in the master branch.
